articles.title: New Vaccine Conspiracy Theories Are Going Viral in Arabic
articles.teaser: Facebook has been criticized for failing to curb misinformation in English. But little attention has been paid to the scale of the problem in Arabic.

articles.title: ‘It is a trap!’: Inside the QAnon attack that never happened
articles.teaser: Why fears of violence on March 4, the mythical day Trump was supposed to be inaugurated to a second term, proved unfounded.
